parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: The IP or host name of the SONY audio device

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Port for the SONY audio device to control. Home Audio products usually use port 10000 and Personal Audio products usually use port 54480.

parameter.name: path
parameter.label: Base Path
parameter.description: The base path, "/sony" in most cases

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The refresh interval in seconds for polling the receiver (0=disable). Binding receive automatically updates from
